org.apache.storm.hdfs.avro

Class GenericAvroSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Serializer<org.apache.avro.generic.GenericContainer>
      • org.apache.storm.hdfs.avro.AbstractAvroSerializer
        • org.apache.storm.hdfs.avro.GenericAvroSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, AvroSchemaRegistry

    public class GenericAvroSerializer
extends AbstractAvroSerializer

    A default implementation of the AvroSerializer that will just pass literal schemas back and forth. This should only be used if no other serializer will fit a use case.

    See Also:
